# WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.Element

**Type Alias**

A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible to your app.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Element = WAPairedDevice.Devices
```

## Getting async updates

- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator**: An iterator for the sequence of devices.
- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Makes an asynchronous iterator that provides successive device snapshots when the list of paired devices known to the app changes.
